title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Observe that the modified default value is not retained in the list box.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Observe if the modified default value is retained in the list box.
